net.java.dev.designgridlayout
Class DesignGridLayoutManager

java.lang.Object
  net.java.dev.designgridlayout.DesignGridLayoutManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayoutManager
public class DesignGridLayoutManager
extends Object
implements LayoutManager

The actual LayoutManager created and installed by DesignGridLayout on a Container. This class cannot be instantiated directly, it is made public so that tools or 3rd-party libraries can detect the use of DesignGridLayout for the layout of a given Container.

In order to find out the instance of DesignGridLayout that created a given DesignGridLayoutManager, you can use

Author:
Jean-Francois Poilpret

Method Detail

designGridLayout

public DesignGridLayout designGridLayout()
Get the instance of DesignGridLayout that built this LayoutManager. This enables you to add rows to a given Container without having the initial DesignGridLayout that managed layout of that Container.

Returns:
the DesignGridLayout that created this DesignGridLayoutManager
